amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 118-511 to require the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to submit an annual report to the Senate and House Judiciary Committees on the number of aliens detained in the custody of the department.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
